name: ColorPlanet Jigsaw Puzzle HD
description:
Remember putting together jigsaw puzzles? The sense of accomplishment at finding just the right piece to complete the puzzle and reveal a beautiful landscape, cute animal, or some other awesome picture? Well, now you can revisit these memories with Jigsaw Puzzle by Color Planet.

Jigsaw Puzzle allows you to return to the old days with tons of awesome puzzles of different types, plus new pictures added every day so you never get bored. You can even create your own puzzles from your photo library, to create moving personal jigsaw challenges.

With an adjustable difficulty setting that goes all the way up to 1200 piece puzzles, Jigsaw Puzzle is perfect no matter your age or skill. So don’t wait to jump into this relaxing, yet exciting, challenge.

Jigsaw Puzzle by Color Planet Features

* Adjustable difficulty for all ages.
Complete puzzles of up to 1200 pieces for an exciting challenge no matter your skill or age.

* 1000+ Huge puzzle library.
Enjoy puzzles and categories for all tastes: nature landscapes and scenes, beautiful architecture, famous buildings and landmarks, cute animals, and more!

* Create your own puzzle!
Jigsaw Puzzle by Color Planet allows you to create your own personal puzzles from your photo library. Your memories make the perfect custom puzzle, and you can turn any picture into a puzzle.

* New puzzles every day!
Jigsaw Puzzle updates its library every day with gorgeous new pictures added to satiate your puzzle solving appetite. Never run out of fresh content

* Share your work!
Easily share your puzzles with friends and other puzzlers across social media. Find awesome new puzzles and share your own amazing work.

* Easy to use.
With a streamlined interface, you’ll never get frustrated completing your puzzle after puzzle

Jigsaw Puzzle by Color Planet is the perfect way to return to warm old-day memories while creating new ones. This high-tech twist on a classic game is perfect for everyone, so don’t wait to start knocking down the Jigsaw challenges. Download now and give it a go!
